name: Pirate Hat
description:
## Pirate Hat

Arrr! A pirate hat is the cherry on top of a swashbuckling ensemble that inspires fear and respect on the seven seas.

### Bumpkins.io

Deposit this wearable in Sunflower Land to equip it on your Bumpkin

### About

Bumpkins is a community driven customisable NFT project powered by Sunflower Land
